mapper.insert: insert into order (id, user_id, good_id, car_id, phone, destination, describe) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, good_id = #{goodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, good_id, car_id, phone, destination, describe from order
